name: Peacock Drusy Cocktail Ring with Opal
description:
This stunning ring features a round rainbow faceted drusy stone which I set in a sterling silver bezel, with a little bezel set lab created opal sprouting off the side. It has my signature scratch band cast from a wax carving I made. Currently
About a 6.5.

name: Iridescent Drusy Ring on Triple Band
description:
I can't even tell you what color this stone is. Hologram? Is hologram a color?

An amazing blue/white/purple stone is set in a handmade oval bezel, which I set on my triple band. It has a secret heart at the bottom of the band! I oxidized the silver to a gunmetal finish.

name: Blue Drusy Crystal Tower Ring
description: This edgy ring features a tall, big crystal blue druzy quartz stone set in my heavy cast bezel ring, with a beaded border going around the stone. I oxidized the silver to a shiny black, and polished the pebbles around the bezel. Handmade by me and one of a kind!

name: Purple Drusy Signet Ring
description: This streamlined but edgy ring features a heavy sterling silver ring that I made in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set a subtle 10mm purple drusy stone in the heavy bezel. The silver has a shiny, smooth, satin finish. Handmade by me!

name: 14k Gold Fill Lightning Bolt Dangles
description: Sharp-looking 14k gold-fill lightning bolts hang from sturdy, good sterling silver lookin' ear wires.

name: Sterling Silver Lightning Bolt Dangles
description: Sharp-looking sterling silver lightning bolts hang from sturdy, good lookin' ear wires.

name: 14k Gold Fill Lightning Bolt Studs
description: These large, lightweight lightning bolts are shiny 14k gold fill and won't flake or tarnish! They have sterling silver earring posts soldered to the middle of the backs. Shiny and edgy!

name: Large Sterling Silver Lightning Bolt Studs
description: These handsome studs feature sterling silver lightning bolts with sterling posts I've soldered on. They have a shiny finish and are very lightweight!

name: Sterling Silver Star Studs
description: NEW! Your favorite star studs, now in shiny sterling silver! Sterling posts too. Cute cute cute.

name: 14k Gold Fill Heart Studs
description: These little darling are new, 14k gold fill version of my brass heart studs! They have a super shiny finish, and won't tarnish or change color!

name: Handmade Pretzel Necklace
description: This little necklace is BIG on personality. Each pretzel is handknotted and soldered by me, out of heavy 16 gauge sterling silver wire. They are hammered to perfection, and no two are alike. They hang on sturdy 16 inch sterling silver cable chains.

name: Pearl Nest ring with Single 14k Gold Pebble
description: The latest in my handmade, one of a kind Pearl Nest Rings .This beauty features a large button pearl set in a sterling silver bezel, which is set atop a handmade wire nest ring that I forged and soldered to perfection. A 14k gold pebble is perched to the side of the pearl. I oxidized the silver to a shiny black finish, to contrast with the white pearl and gold pebble.

name: Blue Aqua Aura Drusy Quartz Statement Cocktail Ring- Handmade One of a Kind by Rachel Pfeffer
description:
This simple but stunning ring is great for cocktail and holiday parties! (Just don't gesticulate to close to that lady in the delicate lace dress!).

I set the tall, pointed, stalagmite-like icey blue aqua aura drusy quartz stone in a strong sterling silver prong setting. It sits on an open square shaped frame, and it set on a heavy round sterling band. Completely handmade by me!

Note: You must take a little care when wearing this ring! It's rather tall and not sharp, but does come to a point, so be careful on what you hit it with. And don't drop it. Or smash it against a wall. Otherwise you should be good to go.

name: Dark Red Alaska Garnet and Sterling Silver Button Hole Bracelet
description:
I call this new style of bracelet The Button Hole- One side hooks up and over the stone, or "button", to keep it closed comfortably around your wrist! 

I handmade the bracelet out of heavy sterling silver wire, which I hammered and etched to a notched texture. A faceted, pointed dark red Alaskan Garnet is set on a little pedestal at the end of one looped side, so that the other looped side and can up above, over, and then hook under the bezel set stone! I created the bezel in sterling silver and drilled little holes around, giving it a unique, antiquated look. I oxidized the silver to a dark gunmetal finish. Totally handmade and one of a kind! It measures about 2.5 inches across.

name: Handmade Lavender Moon Quartz Ring
description: This stunning handmade ring features a 10x8mm lavender moon quartz stone which I've set upside down, so that the curved faceted side faces up in a sterling silver bezel. I set it on my heavy carved Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I flanked the stone with heavy 14k gold pebbles, and oxidized the silver to a black finish to contrast with the gold pebbles and lilac stone. Completely handmade!

name: Handmade Evil Eye Blue Drusy Necklace
description: Meet your new favorite statement necklace! I created a bezel for a 20mm bright blue drusy stone, which I set inside a handmade sterling silver eye shape that I formed in sterling silver wire. It hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver cable chain. Completely handmade, this sparkling eye necklace will keep you safe and keep you wise. Or at least keep you looking awesome.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Shiny Edition - Rose Gold Plated Drusy 10mm Stone
description: This piece is part of the Drusy Deluxe collection, and is sure to please. It features a simple ring design, with a heavy bezel that I carved out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a thicker, more organic look to it than a regular factory made bezel. In the bezel sits a 10 mm sparkling rose gold plated drusy stone. The band is my newly signature flat, heavy Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and had cast also in recycled silver.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Shiny Edition - White 10mm Stone
description: This piece is part of the Drusy Deluxe collection, and is sure to please. It features a simple ring design, with a heavy bezel that I carved out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a thicker, more organic look to it than a regular factory made bezel. In the bezel sits a 10 mm sparkling white drusy stone. The band is my newly signature flat, heavy Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and had cast also in recycled silver.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Shiny Edition - Rainbow 10mm Stone
description: This piece is part of the Drusy Deluxe collection, and is sure to please. It features a simple ring design, with a heavy bezel that I carved out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a thicker, more organic look to it than a regular factory made bezel. In the bezel sits a 10 mm sparkling rainbow drusy stone. The band is my newly signature flat, heavy Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and had cast also in recycled silver. The last photo shows the ring in the white option, but gives you a size reference.

name: Sterling Bike Necklace with Brass Hearts
description: A twist on the classic Le Petit Bike pendant, this little beauty has a loving spin! Two little adorable brass hearts have been soldered to the center of the wheels, giving a playful, individual feel to the necklace. Each pendant is made from a handmade bike that I designed, created, made a mold of, and had cast. They are solid sterling silver and hang on 16 inch sterling silver cable chains.

name: Single Brass Heart Necklace
description: This darling necklace features a perfect brass heart on a shiny 16 inch sterling silver cable chain! Simple and perfect.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Oxidized Edition - Rose Gold Plated 10mm Stone
description: The new and improved Drusy Solitaire Ring, this one features my flat comfortable band I dubbed the Scratch Band, since I gave it a subtle texture when I carved it in wax. The stone is in a heavy, organic bezel that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver as well. This is part of the Oxidized series, so the silver has a matte black finish. A 10mm rose gold plated drusy stone is set in the bezel.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Oxidized Edition - Rainbow 10mm Stone
description: The new and improved Drusy Solitaire Ring, this one features my flat comfortable band I dubbed the Scratch Band, since I gave it a subtle texture when I carved it in wax. The stone is in a heavy, organic bezel that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver as well. This is part of the Oxidized series, so the silver has a matte black finish. A 10mm green/pink/purple/yellow rainbow drusy stone is set in the bezel. No two are alike due to the nature of the drusy stones!

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Oxidized Edition - White 10mm Stone
description: The new and improved Drusy Solitaire Ring, this one features my flat comfortable band I dubbed the Scratch Band, since I gave it a subtle texture when I carved it in wax. The stone is in a heavy, organic bezel that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver as well. This is part of the Oxidized series, so the silver has a matte black finish. A 10mm snowy iridescent white stone is set in the bezel.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Oxidized Edition - Blue 10mm Stone
description: The new and improved Drusy Solitaire Ring, this one features my flat comfortable band I dubbed the Scratch Band, since I gave it a subtle texture when I carved it in wax. The stone is in a heavy, organic bezel that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver as well. This is part of the Oxidized series, so the silver has a matte black finish. A 10mm blue/purple drusy stone is set in the bezel.

name: Sterling and Brass Gemstone Cutout Neck Piece
description: Your new favorite necklace! I artfully linked together my original gemstone castings, in brass and sterling silver. They hang on a unique antique brass box chain. Please indicate length choice when you order! And also be put on an adjustable antique brass chain if you so choose, allowing you to wear it both shorter or longer. No two are alike and each one is handmade by me from my own components.

name: Sterling Silver Heart Bib
description: This fun necklace features 6 brushed sterling silver hearts, linked together into a small bib formation. It hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver chain. Lightweight and adorable, you'll want to wear it every day!

name: Oxidized Black Honey Knuckles Ring
description:
After years of only having the classic Honey Knuckles Ring in silver, I've decided to male a change and offer it in oxidized silver! I am a huge fan of black and gold together, so I was thrilled with how this ring came out. 

This beautiful humdinger of a knuckle ring features the signature sterling silver Rachel Pfeffer designed honeycomb on a comfortable double band, with a wee gold plated bee perched gleefully on the comb somewhere!! It's super comfortable and I think looks best when worn on the middle finger!!

name: Brass Fishtail Earrings
description: These amazingly comfortable and lightweight earrings feature wonderful little arrow shaped brass stampings that I've linked into a chain. The top two stampings have earring posts soldered to them, but the earrings go in opposite directions for a subtle twist.

name: Four Square Drusy Dangles
description:
These kooky earrings are sure to liven up your look. I soldered four sterling silver bezels into a checkerboard style square and hung them from sterling marquis ear wires. You can customize the colors! The options are as follows:

Blue/purple (shown)
White (shown)
green/pink rainbow
black

I can do any combination of those!

name: The Famous Famous Necklace
description:
This necklace design was knockin' around in the old noggin for quite a while, and I am just tickled with how it came out! I created the brass piece by working with wax sheets, melting and forming the words to imperfect perfection. I cast the oversized pendant in recycled brass, and gave it a bright, shiny, brushed finish. It hangs on an 18 inch vintage chain, and can be worn shorter by closing the clasp on any chain link. The necklace has a great weight to it, but doesn't feel heavy at all when it's on! 

Gold plated version coming soon.

name: Coral and Green Drusy Statement Pendant
description: I made this necklace after holding on to this gorgeous coral colored drusy stone for a long time. I created an open back sterling silver setting for the stone, with prongs holding it in. Six 10mm green/pink round bezel set drusies are nestled between the prongs. The design is abstract, sculptural, and eye catching. It hangs on a lovely sterling silver chain. Completely handmade by me and one of a kind!

name: Triple Pyrite Necklace
description: This handsome necklace features three iron pyrite slabs I strung on a sterling silver wire. The pendant hangs on a sterling silver chain. Perfectly rough but geometric and polished at the same time!

name: Rainbow Drusy in Braided Bezel on Scratch Band
description:
This rustic and hearty ring features a 10mm rainbow drusy stone set in a bezel with a braided border that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set it on top of the flat, Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and also had cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the silver to blacken the recesses, and then gave it a bright, frosted finish, lending it an antique feel. Looks great with all stone colors, but you get to pick!

(shown in white on hand)

name: Black Drusy in Braided Bezel on Scratch Band
description: This rustic and hearty ring features a 10mm white drusy stone set in a bezel with a braided border that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set it on top of the flat, Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and also had cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the silver to blacken the recesses, and then gave it a bright, frosted finish, lending it an antique feel. Looks great with all stone colors, but you get to pick!

name: White Drusy in Braided Bezel on Scratch Band
description: This rustic and hearty ring features a 10mm white drusy stone set in a bezel with a braided border that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set it on top of the flat, Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and also had cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the silver to blacken the recesses, and then gave it a bright, frosted finish, lending it an antique feel. Looks great with all stone colors, but you get to pick!

name: Blue Drusy - Braided Bezel Ring on Scratch Band
description: This rustic and hearty ring features a 10mm blue drusy stone set in a bezel with a braided border that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set it on top of the flat, Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and also had cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the silver to blacken the recesses, and then gave it a bright, frosted finish, lending it an antique feel. Looks great with all stone colors, but you get to pick!

name: White Drusy V Dangle Earrings
description: These sparkling eye-catchers feature 5 bright snow white 10-mm drusy stones set in bezels that I soldered into lovely V shapes. They hang on sterling silver chain from a sturdy french wire. Completely handmade and unique, these fellows are perfect for snazzing up any kind of fancy outfit! They are incredibly light-weight and comfortable to wear, and have amazing movement.

name: Sterling Silver Scratch Band with Tourmaline
description: Part of the new Scratch Band series, I carved the band in wax and then had it cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized and then polished the band to shine the top and keep the recesses darkened. I flush set a 2.5mm genuine beautiful pink tourmaline stone in the top of the band. Perfectly simple and lovely.

name: Double Brass Star Dangles
description: Two large brass stars hang from each other on a sterling silver ear wire! What fun!

name: Silver Diamond Outline Studs
description: These edgy earrings feature my original gemstone designs, cast in recycled sterling silver. They have sterling posts, and have been hammered and polished to perfection. Add a little quirk to your ears!

name: Scratch Band- Hand Carved and Cast Band in Recycled Brass
description: This beautiful, rustic band is part of my new Scratch Band series. It features a band I carved in wax and had cast in recycled brass. I oxidized the band to darkened the recesses, and polished the top of the surface to a shiny finish. Looks great stacked with other Scratch Bands. Since this ring is cast in raw brass, depending on how often you wear it and how you store it, it may develop a darkened patina after time. To slow the process, keep dry.

name: Scratch Band- Hand Carved and Cast Band in Recycled Sterling Silver
description: This beautiful, rustic band is part of my new Scratch Band series. It features a band I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the band to darkened the recesses, and polished the top of the surface to a shiny finish. Looks great stacked with other Scratch Bands.

name: Scratch Band- Hand Carved and Cast Band with Three Bezel Set Sleeping Beauty Turquoise
description: This beautiful, rustic band is part of my new Scratch Band series. It features a band I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver, with a three 3mm Sleeping Beauty turquoise cabochons bezel set on top. I oxidized the band to darkened the recesses, and polished the top of the surface to a shiny finish. Completely handmade so now two will be alike! Looks great stacked with other Scratch Bands.

name: Scratch Band- Sterling and Opal
description: This beautiful, rustic band is part of my new Scratch Band series. It features a band I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver, with a bezel set lab created opal on top. I oxidized the band to darkened the recesses, and polished the top of the surface to a shiny finish. Completely handmade so now two will be alike! Looks great stacked with other Scratch Bands.

name: Handmade Black Drusy Ring with Split Shank in Beaded Border by Rachel Pfeffer Designs
description:
This beauty haas a very heavy sterling silver shank and bezel, cast from recycled sterling silver in my original design. It has serious heft to it.

It features a beautiful black sparkling drusy 10 mm stone. set in the heavy sterling silver bezel with a round split shank. A beaded boarder dances around the stone. The silver has a bright brushed finish. The second image shows another style for scale. Very elegant and luxurious while maintaining an edge.

name: Drusy Signet Ring - Heavy Cast Sterling Silver Setting with Rachel Pfeffer Signature Brass Hearts
description:
This beauty haas a very heavy sterling silver shank and bezel, cast from recycled sterling silver in my original design. Each one is embellished individually to achieve a one of a kind creation. It has serious heft to it.

This one features a beautiful iridescent white drusy stone. The heavy sterling silver is oxidized to a shiny black finish, with two bright brushed yellow hearts flanking the sides of the stone. The shank is a very heavy round gage. Very elegant and luxurious while maintaining an edge.

name: Dripping Heart with Ruby
description: This darling ring features my signature hammered open heart ring, with a bezel set 4 mm lab grown ruby, "dripping" from the point of the heart. I gave the heart a shiny polished finish. The ruby glows beautifully bright, with a pink tint!

name: Dripping Heart Turquoise Ring
description: This darling ring features my signature hammered open heart ring, with a bezel set 4 mm Sleeping Beauty Turquoise, "dripping" from the point of the heart. I oxidized the silver to a shiny black hammered finish.

name: White Oval Drusy in Cast Bezel on Triple Band
description: This simple ring features a sparkling white drusy stone set in a bezel that I carved in wax and then cast in recycled sterling silver. It sits on a triple band with a secret heart at the bottom. I oxidized the metal to a shiny black finish, which contrasts beautifully with the white stone!

name: Triple Crown - Sterling Silver and Opal Ring
description: This kooky addition to the family is part of the Triple Crown Series. I carved the ring in wax first and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the metal so that the zig zags are darkened, and polished the silver to a shiny bright finish. I set three 4mm lab grown opal cabochons in sterling silver bezels on top. Perfectly unique! The last image shows the ring on in turquoise for scale.

name: Triple Crown: Sterling Silver and Ruby
description: This kooky addition to the family is part of the Triple Crown Series. I carved the ring in wax first and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the metal so that the zig zags are darkened, and polished the silver to a shiny bright finish. I set three 4mm lab grown ruby cabochons in sterling silver bezels on top. Perfectly unique! Looks awesome stacked with others, too!

name: Triple Crown Ring- Brass and Turquoise
description: This kooky addition to the family is part of the Triple Crown Series. I carved the ring in wax first and had it cast in recycled brass. I oxidized the metal so that the zig zags are darkened, and polished the raw brass to a shiny bright finish. I set three 4mm Sleeping Beauty turquoise cabochons in sterling silver bezels on top. Perfectly unique! Looks awesome stacked with others, too!

name: Sterling Silver Diamond Dangle Earrings
description: These elegant and unique earrings feature my signature gemstone shapes which I made originally in metal and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I hammered the silver diamonds to a shiny finish and polished to perfection. The top diamond has a sterling silver post, and then the two dangle freely beneath it. They have wonderful movement and are so light an comfortable you'll never want to take them off!

name: Blue Drusy Oval Sweetheart Ring
description: Meet the Blue Sweetheart Ring! I set an oval blue drusy stone in a bezel that I carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver, giving it an organic hammered feel. I set it on a heavy round band and flanked the stone with two brass hearts. I oxdized the silver to a shiny black finish and polished the top of the bezel to a shiny silver finish.

name: White Drusy Oval Sweetheart Ring in Heavy Cast Bezel
description: This updated version of the ever popular White Drusy with Hearts Ring features a heavier, more organic bezel that I've carved in wax and had cast in recycle sterling silver. I set an oval sparkling iridescent white drusy stone in the bezel, and flanked the stone with my two signature brass hearts. I oxidized the silver to a black finish. To keep this stone sparkling bright like a diamond, take off when you do the dishes or wash your hands, and be gentle with it!

name: Bronze Camera Necklace
description: This kitchy necklace features my hammered camera design, which I originally made from scratch and had cast in recycled jewelers bronze. It hangs on a vintage plated brass chain, without a clasp, that can slip over your head. Say cheese!

name: Brass Bike Studs
description: Your ears want bikes, you say? Look no further. These statement makers feature my signature tiny bikes, cast from my original creations and cast in recycled brass. I hammered and polished to perfection and gave them sterling silver ear posts. Super comfy to wear!

name: Black and Gold Floating Heart Necklace
description: This simple floating heart is made by me out of sterling silver that I hammered and oxidized to perfection. It hangs from a 14k gold fill jump ring on an 18 inch gold plated chain.

name: Ultra Mega Supreme Brass Star Bib
description: This ultra-statement making necklace features 8 large brass stars and two small ones. They are linked together by 14k gold fill jump rings, and hang on a 14k gold-fill chain. The stars have a slightly brushed finish to them, and over time will develope more of an antiqued look. Also available on a sterling silver chain with sterling jump rings for a two toned effect.

name: Big Brass Studs
description: Are the tiny star studs too small for you? AND the medium ones? Well, don't worry. Here are some giant, awesome ones, that you will never want to take off.  Just get ready to fend off the strangers running up to you to pay you compliments.

name: Medium Brass Star Studs
description: If the tiny star studs were too tiny for you, here's the slightly larger alternative! The brass has a shiny finish, but may slightly develop a patina over time if you leave them out in the wilderness or get them wet. They have sterling silver posts. The perfect size to pack a punch!

name: The Exoskeleton Series- Pearl Ring
description: This quirky ring brings to mind some kind of exoskeleton. I carved it in wax and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. A beautiful little pearl is set in the deep bezel. I oxidized the ring to a dark black finish and polished the little beads to make them pop.

name: Chameleon Eye- Brass and Sterling Silver Carved Ring with Turquoise
description: This ring features a piece that I carved from wax and had cast i recycled brass. I've oxidized the recesses to be black and polished the high parts. The band is a sterling silver triple-band with a little secret heart on the bottom. A 3 mm Sleeping Beauty turquoise is set in a bezel on top! One of my favorite designs.

name: Howlite Heart on Brass Star Pendant
description: This magical necklace features a large howlite heart cabochon with flecks of gold in it, which I set in a handmade sterling silver bezel. It sits on top of a glorious brass star with a bright brushed finish. The big guy hangs on a 16 inch 14k gold fill chain. One of a kind and totally handmade by me.

name: Dripping Heart Coral Ring
description: This darling ring features my signature hammered open heart ring, with a bezel set 4 mm coral cabochon, "dripping" from the point of the heart. The heart has a shiny, hammered finish. Looks great as a thumb ring too!

name: Dripping Heart Opal Ring
description: This darling ring features my signature hammered open heart ring, with a bezel set 4 mm created opal, "dripping" from the point of the heart. I oxidized this heart to a shiny black finish. Looks great as a thumb ring too!

name: Carved Sterling Silver Heart Pendant
description: This necklace features a beautiful heart that I carved from wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. It hangs from two jump rings on a 16 inch sterling silver chain. I oxidized the heart and then polished it, keeping the file marks darker than the polished top. Rustic and romantic, you'll never want to take this one off.

name: Turquoise Nest Ring
description: This shiny handmade ring features my signature nest ring with a 4 mm turquoise cabochon set amongst the twigs! Beautiful and unique, and totally handmade.

name: The Chameleon Collection- Big Brass Earrings with Turquoise
description: These earrings feature my hand carved brass chameleon eyes, which I've had cast in recycled brass. I set sleeping beauty 3 mm cabs in the center bezels. They have sterling silver posts, and are truly unique.

name: Sterling Silver Chameleon Necklace
description: The fabulous necklace is part of the new Chameleon Collection, which evolves around a domed, leveled disc that I carved by hand in wax and then had cast in recycled sterling silver. The back is hollowed out, and a 3 mm Sleeping Beauty turquoise cabochon is set in the middle bezel. The pendant hangs on a 16 inch sterling siler chain, and is strung through a secret jump ring on the back of the pendant. I oxidized the metal to a black finish and then polished the top, so that the recesses remained black and antiqued looking. This mystic pendant is completely finished by hand in my studio.

name: White Drusy Oval Ring in Cast Bezel
description: This sparkly delight of a ring features an opalescent white drusy stone which I've set in a heavy sterling silver bezel, that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set it on a heavy shiny sterling silver band and oxidized the sides of the heavy bezel. I ground the edge of the bezel over the stone to hold it in and protect it, resulting in a bright silver lip on top of the stone. Completely handmade by me, so no two will be identical!

name: Oval Blue Drusy Ring in Cast Bezel on 14k Gold Fill Band
description: This sparkly delight of a ring features an oval blue drusy stone which I've set in a heavy sterling silver bezel, that I carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I set it on a hammer 14k gold-filled band. and oxidized the sides of the heavy bezel. I ground the edge of the bezel over the stone to hold it in and protect it, resulting in a bright silver lip on top of the stone. Completely handmade by me, so no two will be identical!

name: Hand Carved Sterling Silver Ring with blue star sapphire
description: I carved this sculptural ring out of wax, and then had it cast in recycled sterling silver. The band is has a groove going down the middle, with soft rounded halves. Rows of organic little pebbles crawl along the groove, to a unique bezel that holds the star sapphire cabochon. The perfect every day ring, or alternative engagement ring!

name: Hand Carved Amethyst Sterling Silver Ring
description: I carved this sculptural ring out of wax, and then had it cast in recycled sterling silver. The band is has a groove going down the middle, with soft rounded halves. Rows of organic little pebbles crawl along the groove, to a unique bezel that holds the dark purple amethyst. The perfect every day ring, or alternative engagement ring!

name: Big Star Brass Necklace on 14k Gold Fill Chain
description: This is the bigger version of the small triple star necklace. It features 5 big and bold brass stars, linked together by 14k gold fill jump rings. It hangs on a 14k gold fill chain. The total necklace length is about 18 inches, and can be worn shorter if you close it on a different link in the chain!

name: Small Triple Star Necklace - Brass and Gold Fill Chain
description: A simple, celestial necklace for your chest! This piece features three smallish brass stars, linked together with 14k gold fill jump rings, on a 14k gold-fill chain. The chain is 18 inches, and with the stars, it about 20 inches total. You can wear it long, like I do in one image, or close it on any of the links on the chain to me shorter. If you'd like it to be permanently shorter let me know, choose that option!

name: Petite Blue Drusy Pendant in gold fill bezel
description: This petite darling pendant features a vivid and sparkling blue drusy oval stone which I've set in a 14k gold-fill oval bezel. It hangs on an 18 inch gold plated brass chain, that sparkles as much s the drusy.

name: Mini Honeyknuckles Ring - honeycomb- bee
description: This slightly smaller version of my ever popular Honey Knuckles ring features a handmade sterling silver honeycomb that I hammered and polished to perfection. A gold plated brass bee is perched on top of the honeycomb. It has a heavy round band, and can be made in any size!

name: Three Peas in a Pod- Indigo and White Drusy
description: Well, this might be the cocktail ring to end all cocktail rings. I soldered three heavy bezels, which i carved from wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver, together in a row, and gave a heavy round double band. I oxidized the silver black to contrast with the color of the stones. The ring is super comfortable and incredibly stunning. The stones are 10 mm iridescent white drusy and indigo purple cabochons. This ring is made to order, so if you would like different colors, or would rather a shiny silver finish, just message me!

name: Triple White Drusy Ring
description: Well, this might be the cocktail ring to end all cocktail rings. I soldered three heavy bezels, which i carved from wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver, together in a row, and gave a heavy round double band. I oxidized the silver black to contrast with the snow white of the stones. The ring is super comfortable and incredibly stunning. The stones are 10 mm iridescent white drusy cabochons. This ring is made to order, so if you would like different colors, or would rather a shiny silver finish, just message me!

name: Indigo Purple Sweetheart Drusy Ring
description: This fabulous ring rings my new favorite drusy color: indigo purple! It straddles the line of blue and purple, landing just in between. I set it in my hand carved-then- cast bezel. It has a heavy round band, with two brass herts flanking the stone on either side. I oxidized the ring in this version, but can leave it shiny silver too!

name: White Drusy Sweetheart Ring
description: This sparkling beauty features an amazing iridescent 10 mm white druzy stone, which I set it in my hand carved-then-cast bezel. It has a heavy round band, with two brass herts flanking the stone on either side. I oxidized the ring in this version, but can leave it shiny silver too! Shown in purple to express size.

name: Drusy Deluxe: Green Galaxy Drusy Studs
description: These hearty studs feature 10 mm sparkling green/pink/purple (hence green galaxy) drusy stones set in a heavy sterling silver bezels, cast from my original wax carvings. They have sterling silver posts and have been polished to a shiny finish.

name: Drusy Deluxe: Heavy Cast Sterling Silver Bezel White Drusy Studs
description: These hearty studs feature 10 mm sparkling indigo purple drusy stone set in a heavy sterling silver bezels, cast from my original wax carvings. They have sterling silver posts and have been polished to a shiny finish.

name: Drusy Deluxe- Heavy Bezel Studs with Indigo Drusy
description:
These hearty studs feature 10 mm sparkling indigo purple drusy stone set in a heavy sterling silver bezels, cast from my original wax carvings. They have sterling silver posts and have been polished to a shiny finish.

The last image shows the earrings in blue for size.

name: Faceted Turquoise Braided Ring
description: This quirky ring features a 10 mm bright turquoise faceted cabochon, set in a bezel that I created out of wax and had cast in recycled metal. The band is a heavy round shank that has been slightly hammered. Totally handmade and one of a kind.

name: Blue Amazonite Ring
description: This sea worthy ring features a beautiful and bright 10 mm blue amazonite cabochon, which I set in a heavy bezel that I originally carved in wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver. I gave it a heavy beaded sterling silver band. The silver has a super shiny bright finish.

name: The Chameleon Collection- Sterling Ring
description: The fabulous ring is part of the new Chameleon Collection, which evolves around a domed, leveled disc that I carved by hand in wax and then had cast in recycled brass. I finish each ring myself in my studio. The band is a comfortable triple band with a little secret heart at the bottom. I oxidized the silver to blacked the recesses, and gave the surface a shiny polish. A 3 mm Sleeping Beauty Turquoise stone is bezel set in the middle. Completely handmade by me!

name: Chameleon's Eye Pendant- Hand Carved Brass Pendant with Turquoise
description: I carved this amazing design by had out of wax using a series of techniques and tools, and then had it cast in recycled brass. The back is hollowed out, and a small turquoise cabochon is set in the middle bezel. The pendant hangs on a 16 inch 14k gold fill chain, and is strung through a secret jump ring on the back of the pendant. I oxidized the metal to a black finish and then polished the top, so that the recesses remained black and antiqued looking. This mystic pendant is completely finished by hand in my studio.

name: Blue Drusy V Dangle Earrings in Sterling Silver
description: These sparkling eye-catchers feature 5 vivid blue 10-mm drusy stones set in bezels that I soldered into lovely V shapes. They hang on handmade hammered sterling silver "links", which connect at the top on a sterling silver ear wire. Completely handmade and unique, these fellows are perfect for snazzing up any kind of fancy outfit! They are incredibly light-weight and comfortable to wear, and have amazing movement.

name: Pearl Nest Ring with 14k Gold Pebbles
description: This organic handmade beauty features a sterling silver nest ring with a small pearl set in a bezel amidst the twigs. The pearl is flanked by two 14k gold pebbles. I oxidized the silver to a gun metal finish, which contrasts nicely with the white of the pearl and the yellow of the gold! Completely handmade and one of a kind.

name: Hand Carved Textured Sterling Silver Heart Studs
description: These hearts are cast in recycled sterling from my original hand carved wax hearts. They have a lovely slightly faceted, textured finish, and have a wonderful puffy-heart look. They have sturdy sterling silver posts and have a super shiny finish.

name: Faceted Organic Sterling Silver Heart Ring
description: This ultra comfortable and chic ring will be your new favorite item in your jewelry wardrobe. It features a hearty heart that I carved out of wax and had cast in recycled sterling silver, and maintains a slightly textured, faceted surface. It hangs a comfortable round hammered band.

name: Blue Drusy V Necklace
description: This fabulous necklace features 5 bezel set 10mm sparkling blue drusy stones, which I soldered into a V configuration. It hangs on a lovely 16 inch sterling silver cable chain. It looks so amazingly beautiful on, you will never want to take it off!!

name: Carved Sterling Silver Popsicle Pendant
description: I carved this darling little pendant out of a piece of wax and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. It hangs on an 18 inch chain.

name: Hand carved Sterling Silver Cast Ring with XOXO and Hearts
description: I carved this funky ring out of a chunk of wax and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. I oxidized the recesses so that the carved parts are darker. I carved hearts and chevrons all over the ring. This ring has great weight and it super sturdy!

name: Heavy Cast Brass Carved Ring XOXO and Hearts
description: I carved this funky ring out of a chunk of wax and had it cast in recycled brass. I oxidized the recesses so that the carved parts are darker. I carved hearts and chevrons all over the ring.

name: Drusy Deluxe: Sterling Silver Cleopatra Ring with Rainbow Drusy
description: I carved this ring from wax and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. It features a 6 mm rainbow sparkling drusy stone flush set in the top. The sides of the ring have a striated texture while the top is smooth. This image shows the ring oxidized and then polished, leaving the recesses dark. If you'd like I can leave it all bright silver, see last image for examples.

name: Drusy Deluxe: Sterling Silver Cleopatra Ring with Black Drusy

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Shiny Edition - Black 10mm Stone
description: This piece is part of the Drusy Deluxe collection, and is sure to please. It features a simple ring design, with a heavy bezel that I carved out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a thicker, more organic look to it than a regular factory made bezel. In the bezel sits a 10 mm sparkling back drusy stone. The band is my newly signature flat, heavy Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and had cast also in recycled silver. The last photo shows the ring in the white option, but gives you a size reference.

name: Scratch Band Drusy Solitaire- Shiny Edition - Blue 10mm Stone
description: This piece is part of the Drusy Deluxe collection, and is sure to please. It features a simple ring design, with a heavy bezel that I carved out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a thicker, more organic look to it than a regular factory made bezel. In the bezel sits a 10 mm sparkling blue drusy stone. The band is my newly signature flat, heavy Scratch Band, which I carved in wax and had cast also in recycled silver. The last photo shows the ring in the white option, but gives you a size reference.

name: Drusy Deluxe: Rainbow Drusy Simple Solitair
description: This piece is part of the Drusy Deluxe collection, and is sure to please. It features a simple ring design, with a heavy bezel that I carved out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a thicker, more organic look to it than a regular factory made bezel. In the bezel sits a 10 mm sparkling rainbow drusy stone. The band is  heavy round shank.

name: The Tuxedo Ring- Sterling Silver and Pearl Ring
description: I carved this wonderful ring out of wax and cast it in sterling silver. It has great weight and wonderful texture. I oxidized it to a shiny black finish, and just polished the narrow flat sides, giving it tuxedo stripes. A 6 mm button pearl is set in the smooth top surface of the ring!

name: 14k Gold Fill Blue Drusy Dangles
description:
These beauties features bright blue druzy stones, which I've set in 14k gold-fill oval bezels. They hang frmo 14k yellow gold fill ear wires. Blue and gold. what could be better?

The last image shows the earrings in white, for size reference.

name: Pink and Black Drusy Pendant
description: This simple yet striking necklaces features a beautiful, warm pink drusy stone, which I've set in a sterling silver bezel. I oxidized the silver of the bezel and the chain to a black finish, which really contrasts beautifully with the stone. The chain is 18 inches long. The stone is 12 x 16 mm.

name: Limited Edition Rose Gold-Plated Drusy Studs
description: I have a few more of these beautiful, rose-gold plated drusy stones left! These studs feature 10 mm drusies set in sterling silver bezels with sterling posts. Completely stunning and sparkly.

name: Gold Plated Anchor Dangles
description: These sparkling earrings feature my signature hand-crafted anchors, which have been cast in brass and plated in a thick layer of 14k gold. They hang on 14k gold-fill ear wires. They look like a million bucks!

name: White Drusy Leverback Dangles
description: https://www.etsy.com/listing/157252406/white-drusy-lever-back-dangles?ref=shop_home_active

name: Abstract Geometric Pendant
description: This spunky little guy features a brass triangle with a black sparkling drusy set in a sterling silver bezel. The pendant hangs in the middle of a 16 inch 14k gold fill chain.

name: All Sterling Gemstone Cut-out Necklace
description: Your new favorite necklace! I artfully linked together my original gemstone castings, but this time in all sterling silver. They hang on a 14k gold-fill or sterling silver chain (14k gold fill shown here). In the photographed necklace, the charms are linked together with yellow 14k gold fill jump rings, making the necklace two-toned. Please choose if you'd like it two toned or all sterling in the options . No two are alike and each one is handmade by me from my own components.

name: White Drusy Oval Studs
description: These darling studs features 10 x 8 mm opalescent white drusy stones, which I've set in sterling silver bezels. I've oxidized the silver to a shiny black, and gave them sterling silver posts. Perfectly dainty and sparkling stones for your lobes!

name: White Drusy Pendant
description: This dainty pendant features a sparkling, opalescent 10 mm by 8 mm druzy stone, which I set in a sterling silver bezel that I formed into a pendant. I oxidized the bezel to a matte black finish, and hung it on a lovely sterling silver cable chain.

name: Triple Blue Drusy Band
description: This edgy and bold band features three 6mm sparkling midnight blue drusy stones which I set in sterling silver cabochons. They are set on top of a comfortable triple band with a little secret heart on the bottom of the band. I oxidized the silver and then gave it a light polish, brightening up the edges of the bezel and the top of the band, while keeping the recesses dark. Completely handmade.

name: Blue Drusy Oval Ring with Hearts
description: This signature Rachel Pfeffer design was completely handmade by me! I set a wonderful 10 x 8 blue drusy crystal stone in a sterling silver bezel, which I set on a heavy round band. Two brass hearts flank the sides of the stone. I oxidized the silver to a black shiny finish. Completely handmade by me, and due to the organic nature of the stones, no two will be identical!

name: Golden Drusy Pronged Studs
description: Two large golden druzy crystal cabochons are set in quirky sterling silver cast prongs. They have subtle etching on the prongs, resembling that of an eagle's claw. Sparkly. Unique. One of a kind.

name: Blue Drusy Oval Studs
description: These sparkling darling feature bright blue oval drusy stones that are 10 mm by 8 mm, and are set in sterling silver bezels. The posts are soldered to the tops of the ovals, letting them hang down. You can also wear them sideways (see third photo). Whatever you want!

name: Snow White Drusy Druzy Ring
description: Everyone's favorite ring is back! I set a sparkling, opalescent white drusy oval stone in a sterling silver bezel, and flanked it with my two signature brushed brass hearts. It has a comfortable round band. I oxidized the silver to a black finish, and polished the hearts to really pop! Each stone varies, but they will will all be like this one.

name: Sterling Silver Dachshund Necklace
description:
Meet Frank! Or Rusty. Or Ruby. Or Yoshi. Whatever name you want! Or Hot. Or Weenie. Or Wiener. Or just a heart!

This handsome puppy was carved by myself out of wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. He hangs on a 16 inch sterling rolo chain. One side is smooth, the other side is "furry". I can customize the smooth side by stamping whatever you want (see last image, which shows him in brass)! If you want a customized name, just message me when you order. Otherwise choose from the options!

name: Snow White Drusy Studs
description: 10 mm white opalescent drusies are set in shiny sterling silver bezels with sterling posts. So sparkly your eyes will explode. I oxidized the silver to a shiny black finish.

name: Brass Hot Dog Necklace Customizable
description:
Meet Frank! Or Rusty. Or Ruby. Or Yoshi. Whatever name you want! Or Hot. Or Weenie. Or Wiener. Or just a heart!

This handsome puppy was carved by myself out of wax and cast in recycled brass. He hangs on a 16 inch 14k gold fill rolo chain. One side is smooth, the other side is "furry". I can customize the smooth side by stamping whatever you want! If you want a customized name, just message me when you order. Otherwise choose from the options!

name: Dachshund Sterling Silver Knuckle Ring
description:
He's back and better than ever!! After a long hiatus, I have re-designed my well loved hot dog ring. This time I carved him out of wax and cast him in recycled sterling silver. And there are so many options! First of all, he has a wide half-round band on the bottom. This guy has a heart stamped on him, but he can come unstamped, or stamped with a name, or with more hearts. The underside of the hot dog has a furrier finish (see necklace sample). So please be sure to let me know how you want it finished!! Simply email me after you order with your customized request.

Suggestions: 

Heart (shown)

Hot
Weenie
