name: Brass Tutu Ring
description:
I carved this hearty sterling silver ring originally out of a block of wax, and then cast it in recycled brass. It's thick and rustic and would make a great everyday statement ring. Durable and comfortable, it's just about perfect. I oxidized the recesses to a dark black and polished the highlights to make the top parts really shine. It looks like a tutu, no??

please allow 1-2 weeks to get this ring in your size.

name: Heavy Sterling Silver Tutu Ring
description:
I carved this hearty sterling silver ring originally out of a block of wax, and then cast it in recycled sterling silver. It's thick and rustic and would make a great everyday statement ring. Durable and comfortable, it's just about perfect. I oxidized the recesses to a dark black and polished the highlights to make the top parts really shine. It looks like a tutu, no??

please allow 1-2 weeks to get this ring!

name: Peacock Drusy Cocktail Ring
description: This oversized stunner of a cocktail ring features an oval, faceted peacock colored drusy stone, with a center full of sparkling crystals. I created a sterling silver bezel for it and lined it with antique-y beaded wire. After a series of steps including oxidizing, polishing, and tumbling, the resulting ring is beautiful with an air of mystery and an antique-feel. The band is my signature hammered triple-band, with a secret silver heart on the bottom. I have a couple more of these stones left, but since each ring is handmade, no two will look the same. This listing is for the ring shown!

name: Double Oxidized Circle Necklace
description: Two hammered, oxidized sterling silver hoops, one bigger than the other, are forever entwined with one another. They hang on a 16 inch sterling silver chain. Completely handmade .

name: Turquoise Bezel Ring
description: This beautiful ring features a beautiful green/blue turquoise stone set in a heavy sterling silver bezel setting. I set it on top of my signature triple bands, which has a little silver heart on the bottom of the band. I oxidized the silver and the gave it a brushed finish, leaving it with a frosted, antiqued finish. Available in any size, please indicate when you order! no two stones will be identical.

name: Lilac Drusy Ring with Hearts
description: This delightful ring features a lavender druzy oval stone for which I created a sterling silver bezel. It sits on top of a heavy round band, with two brass hearts flanking the sides of the stone. Completely handmade by me!

name: Triple Triangle Studs
description: After making countless Tri Triangle Necklaces, I realized I needed a pair of earrings like them! So I made the bundle of dangling brass triangles, and soldered sterling silver posts to the tops of the triangles. The resulting look is a wonderful, oversized cascading triangle waterfall coming out of your ear lobes. In an awesome way. The triangles are held together by 14k gold filled jump rings. Sterling silver posts and backs. Super light weight, great jingle.

name: Medium Oxidized Sterling and Brass Diamond Necklace
description: A smaller version of the Gemstone necklace, this one features four oxidized black hammered sterling silver diamond shapes cast in recycled silver from my original creations. A brass one hangs from the bottom. The whole centerpiece is hung on a 16 inch 14k gold fill chain, which can be worn shorter if wanted. Completely handmade!

name: Blue Drusy Nest Ring
description: I created this ring out of sterling silver wire. It is soldered and oxidized to perfection, and has a comfortable half round band on the bottom. I set a dark blue sparkling drusy in a bezel in the middle of the nest. Completely handmade and one of a kind!

name: Shooting Star Drusy Ring
description: This show stopper features a sparkling dark blue drusy star, which I set in a handmade sterling silver bezel. I gave it a gold metallic leather tail, which is securely set in a sterling setting as well. It has a heavy half round band, and is the perfect addition to your ring collection.

name: Lightning Bolt Studs
description: Behold! An electrifying pair of simple brass studs with sterling silver posts soldered to the backs!

name: Gold Drusy on Wide Black Band
description: This fabulous ring features a beautifully striking 10 mm golden drusy stones which I set in a sterling silver bezel and placed on top of a wide sterling band. I stamped markings along the top of the band, and oxidized the silver to a shiny black finish.

name: Black and Gold Diamonds on Diamonds Necklace
description: Your new favorite necklace! I artfully linked together my original gemstone castings, in brass and oxidized black sterling silver. They hang on a unique antique brass box chain. Please indicate length choice when you order! It can also be put on an adjustable antique brass chain if you so choose, allowing you to wear it both shorter or longer. No two are alike and each one is handmade by me from my own components. The second image shows the shiny sterling and brass version.

name: Tiny Triangle Studs Brass
description: These delightful little earrings consist of two tiny little brass triangles, that have been polished to a bright finish. They have sterling silver posts and backs.

name: Silver Anchor with Heart
description: Sterling Silver Anchor. Brass Heart. End of story.

name: Chartreuse Drusy Ring
description: This big and bold chartreuse ring features a beautifully sparkling oval stone which I set in a high handmade sterling silver bezel. I gave it a simple round beaded band. The bezel is hammered slightly over the stone, giving it a framed look. The silver has been oxidized to a black finish.

name: Diamonds on Diamonds
description: Your new favorite necklace! I artfully linked together my original gemstone castings, in brass and sterling silver. They hang on a unique antique brass box chain. Please indicate length choice when you order! And also be put on an adjustable antique brass chain if you so choose, allowing you to wear it both shorter or longer. No two are alike and each one is handmade by me from my own components.

name: 10 MM Blue Drusy Studs
description:
These sparkling studs feature bright blue 10 mm drusy stones which I set in sterling silver bezels with posts. Sparkles beyond belief. 

The color of the stones will range from a purple/blue to more of a true blue- if you have a preference please let me know!

name: Heart Digit Ring
description: A midi ring, just for you! Oxidized black sterling silver band, .25 inch brass heart. Handmade by me!

name: White Drusy Crystal Ring with Prongs
description: This stunning chunk of a drusy ring features a naturally white, free formed drusy crystal, which I set in a handmade sterling silver bezel with round band. I oxidized the silver to a shiny black finish to contrast vividly with the stone. Completely handmade by me!

name: Long Mirrored Triangle Dangles
description: These are my new go to earrings! The top triangles have sterling silver posts, and the rest of them dangle from one another on sterling jump rings! Long and lightweight, the perfect everyday eye catching dangles.

name: Black Drusy Sweetheart Ring - Black Drusy with Brass Hearts
description: Here's a classic Rachel Pfeffer ring, featuring a 10 mm midnight black sparkling drusy stone set in a heavy cast organix bezelbezel, flanked by yellow brass hearts. The setting is on top of a heavy hammered band, and the silver has been oxidized to a dark black finish. This ring is made to order so no two will be identical!

name: Turquoise and Brass Dangles
description: I found these hinged brass and turquoise colored stone components in a vintage jewelry warehouse, and knew they had to be earrings! I soldered sterling silver posts to the back, and voila- the perfect earrings!! They hang straight but have great swinging movement as well. Very light weight and totally unique. Only a limited amount available!

name: Black Druzy and Brass Triangle Dangle Studs
description: These earrings are absolute stunners. They feature beautiful black sparkling druzy stones (10 mm) set in sterling silver bezels with sterling posts and backs. I attached tiny sterling jump rings to the bottom of the bezels, and dangles two shining brass triangles from the stones. Very architectural and glitzy, they can be worn to dress up an outfit and would go great with jeans and a tee!

name: Ice Cream Cone
description: This darling necklace came to me when it was finally starting to feel warmer out. I sawed the ice cream scoop out of sterling silver and plopped it on a brass come. It hangs simply on a 16 inch sterling silver chain. Totally adorable!

name: Small Heart Necklace
description: Buy one, or buy a million! You choose the chain finish- shiny sterling, oxidized black, or 14k yellow gold fill, and the heart- shiny silver, or oxidized black! Mix and match or just wear one. The heart hangs on the middle of the chain, but the jump rings aren't soldered to the heart, so the heart can be worn right side up, or hang sideways, whatever it feels like doing! The chains are 18 inches long. This listing is for one necklace!

name: Tiny Brass Heart Studs
description: I made these little guys out of stamped brass hearts! They are tiny and have a brushed finish and are so comfortable you will forget you are wearing them. Perfect and simple, with sterling silver posts and backs.

name: Rainbow Drusy Ring
description: This galactic delight features a sparkling rainbow drusy stone, which I set in a sterling silver bezel. It sits atop a shiny slightly hammered round sterling silver band, which has been polished brightly.

name: Small Gold Drusy Ring
description: A small 6 mm gold coated drusy stone sparkles atop a simple slightly hammered heavy round sterling silver band. I oxidized the silver to a shiny black finish, which contrasts beautifully with the gold stone. Looks great when worn with other colors as stackables!

name: Copper and Sterling Silver Blue Drusy Studs
description: I am very excited by this latest color combo! I set the bluest of blue, sparkliest of sparkly, 6 mm drusy stones in shiny copper bezels, which I soldered sterling silver posts to. Perfect for every day wear!

name: Midnight Black Drusy Studs
description: These handsome earrings feature 10 mm black drusy stones, which I set in sterling silver bezels with sterling posts. They are quite stunning and dramatic, in a subtle kind of way. Very sparkly and romantic!

name: Amethyst Geode Necklace with Triangles
description: This abstract pendant features a big chunky lilac colored piece of amethyst geode, which I set in a sterling silver bezel. It has brass triangle accents at the top. Hammered 14k gold filled links form a triangle on top, from which it hangs on an 18 inch gold plated chain.

name: Cranberry Drusy Pendant
description: This detailed necklace features a beautiful cranberry colored drusy crystal, which I created an elaborate handmade setting for out of brass and sterling silver. It hangs on an 18 inch gold plated brass chain which is super sparkly and shiny, to go with the equally sparkling stone. Completely handmade and one of a kind.

name: Ice Cream Cone Studs
description: These little handmade ice cream cones are made from sterling silver scoops and brass cones! They are sterling silver posts. Perfectly adorable.

name: Natural Dalmatian Drusy Studs
description: These elegant and edgy earrings feature amazingly beautiful naturally colored white speckled druzy. I created close backed sterling silver bezels for them, which I oxidized to a brushed black finish. They have sterling silver posts. Quite stunning and one of a kind!

name: Fish Bone Ring
description:
Another fish ring that pays homage to my love of the Mediterranean diet. (I have a vivid memory of having a full fish skeleton left over from a delicious meal in Greece).

I crafted this from scratch, and then had it cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a comfortable half round band, which is slightly hammered. Super comfy for every day wear, and since it's solid sterling silver, it won't discolor your skin in any way.

name: Handmade Shine On Drusy Pendant - OOAK
description:
This fun and quirky necklace was inspired by my trip to Iceland, where I noticed a unique bezel-set-stone-on-brass-rectangle pendant like design on the costume of a wax figure in a Saga Museum that explained how the vikings discovered Iceland. Long story short, this came from my mind. So, thanks Iceland!!! 

Back to the necklace: I bezel set a bright green drusy stone in sterling silver on a hand cut and stamped brass base. It hangs on a 14k gold fill chain, which can be worn long at 18 inches, or shorter if you close the clasp on any other link. I texturized and oxidized the brass, giving it an antiqued look. Completely handmade and one of a kind! Shine on!

name: Icelandic Lava Bead Dangles
description: These earrings were inspired by a trip I took to Iceland, where I picked up these lovely little lava beads!! I hung them on long sterling silver marquis ear wires. Beautiful lines and shapes!

name: Rainbow Drusy Studs
description: These fabulous studs feature purple/green/blue/black sparkling druzy stones, which I set in shiny sterling silver bezel settings, and soldered sterling silver posts to. They come with strong backs, and are the perfect earrings to take you into the holiday season!

name: Le Very Petite Brass Bike Necklace
description:
Finally, Le Very Petite Bike necklace is now available in brass!! It's cast in recycled brass from my original creation, and hand hammered and polished by myself to have a lovely shine. It hangs on a 16 or 18 inch 14k gold filled cable chain.

Due to popular demand, please allow around 2 weeks to get this item!

name: Chocolate Drusy Prong Studs
description: These beautiful, sparkling earrings feature square shaped, chocolate colored drusy stones, which I set in handmade sterling silver prong settings.  They have sterling silver posts, and are quite stunning!

name: Ice Cream Earrings
description: These darling handmade earrings feature little sterling silver ice cream scoops that I handcut and perched on top of stamped, brass cones. The silver ice cream has a slightly rough, bright textured finish. They hang on sterling silver ear wires.

name: Gold Drusy Studs
description: These darling studs feature 10 mm sparkling gold drusy stones, which I set in shiny stering silver bezels with sterling silver posts! Sparkling and bright, these are sure to be the cherry on top of your ensemble.

name: Blue Drusy Prong Ring
description: This dainty little handmade ring features a petite sparkling royal blue drusy stone, which I set in little prongs on a heavy round band. Simple and beautiful.

name: Brass Triangle Dangles
description: These dangly joys feature thee brass triangles, hanging from one another on 14k gold fill jump rings. The top triangles have sterling posts soldered to them. They have sturdy titanium backs.

name: Sterling Silver Diamond Shape Ring
description: This quirky ring features my own diamond design which I crafted from scratch and cast in recycled sterling silver. I soldered a thick round band to it, and have it a slightly rounded, hammered finish. Lightweight and comfy!

name: Sterling and Brass Gemstone Shape Cuff
description: Bracelets! What a world! I made this darling little guy using sterling silver half round wire, which I hammered and forged into a dainty cuff, with the bottom ends rounded and soldered for comfort. A brass diamond outline sits on the top of the cuff, with a 4 mm simulated opal bezel set in a sterling setting on top of the bracelet. It is sized for a wrist on the smaller size, with the width being about 6 cm. If you'd like a bigger size made, just let me know! It's easy to put on and take off, and comfortable! Completely handmade by me.

name: Geometric Brass Earrings
description: These geometric earrings feature brass two brass triangles and a brass tear drop, all hanging artfully from one another on yellow 14k gold filled jump rings. I soldered sterling silver posts to the middles of the top triangles, making them float on your lobes!

name: Bike Ring with Hearts
description: This cutesy twist on my signature Bike Ring features two little brass hearts on the spokes! The bike is cast in recycled sterling silver from my original creation, and has a heavy round band. The ring has a very shiny, slightly hammered finish! Wears best on the middle finger.

name: Tiny Silver Heart Neklace
description: Have you been hankering for the perfect, adorable everyday necklace? Well have I got good news for you! This is it. A dainty, quirky little heart hangs peacefully on a 16 inch sterling silver cable chain. The heart has a lovely little brushed finish, giving it a nice subtle texture.

name: Snow White Drusy Oval Ring
description: This bold and simple ring features a stunning snow white sparkling drusy stone which I set in a heavy sterling silver bezel. It's set on my signature triple band, with a secret heart on the bottom of the band. I oxidized the silver to a black finish and gave it a brushed finish. Completely handmade!

name: Brass Pyramid Ring
description: This Shape Ring features my original pyramid design, which I created from scratch and had cast in recycled brass. The band is 14k gold-fill, and the pyramid has a shiny hammered finish!

name: 10 MM Purple Drusy Studs
description: These studs feature sparkling purple drusy stones which I set in sterling silver bezels, with sterling posts!

name: Tiny Purple Drusy Studs
description: These little sparkling delights feature bright purple 6mm drusy stones, which I set in sterling silver bezels and soldered to sterling posts. Super sparkly and bright! The last image shows a silver pair for size reference.

name: Sterling Silver Handmade Diamond Outline Pendant
description: This latest design is one of my new favorites. The focal point of the necklace is a shiny hammered  sterling silver diamond outline, which I forged myself from scratch and had cast in recycled sterling silver. It hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver chain!

name: Handmade Brass Gemstone Necklace
description: This latest design is one of my new favorites. The focal point of the necklace is a shiny hammered brass diamond outline, which I forged myself from scratch and had cast in recycled brass. It hangs on a 14k gold-fill chain, which won't discolor or tarnish! Please choose the length chain you'd like.

name: Black and Gold Diamond Cut Out Pendant
description: This fun little guy features oxidized sterling silver underneath a brass gemstone outline. Handmade by me, it hangs on a 16 inch oxidized sterling silver chain.

name: DC Flag Necklace
description: After moving to DC two years ago, I quickly fell in love with the DC flag design. And everyone knows how full of pride DC-ers are! I created this rustic flag design from scratch and then had it cast in recycled brass. I oxidized the back and polished the stars and stripes. It hangs on a shiny gold plated brass 18 inch chain.

name: Monogrammed Heart Ring
description: This handsome ring features my signature heavy heart ring, which is cast from my original design in recycled sterling silver. The heart has a highly polished finish, and is engraved with your monogram! When you order this ring, please be sure to email me the initials you want engraved! Traditionally, it goes first initial on the left, middle initial on the right, and last name initial in the big middle spot.

name: Tiny Frosted Gold Drusy Studs
description: Adorable and sparkly gold plated drusy stones are set in sterling silver bezels, which I made into post backed studs. The silver has a frosted finish. No two pair are identical, due to the natural formation of the crystals! 6mm wide.

name: Tiny Blue Drusy Studs
description: These sparkling delights feature beautiful blue drusy stones which I set in sterling silver bezels, and soldered sterling posts to. I frosted the silver to a soft and shiny finish. They measure 6 mm across. The last image is just to show the size on an ear lobe. No two stones will be identical!

name: Tiny Rainbow Drusy Studs
description: These delightful little studs feature beautiful rainbow colored, sparkling drusy stones which I set in sterling silver bezels with sterling posts. They are 6mm wide, and the last photo just shows the size of the stone on the ear lobe! (in a diff. color)

name: Tiny Black Silver Heart Studs
description: These tiny darlings feature sterling silver hearts which I soldered sterling posts to, and then oxidized it all to a very dark black finish. Tiny earrings that pack a punch!

name: Blue Druzy Orbit Studs
description: These handmade beauties feature a midnight blue sparkling druzy 10 mm stone, which I set in a sterling silver bezel. I created a beaded silver orbit that goes around it, and extends past the bottom of it. I oxidized the silver and then polished and brushed the tops of the beads, giving it a two toned quality. They hang on long sterling silver marquis ear wires.

name: Oxidized Pyramid Earrings
description: Meet the new collection, Pyramid! These pyramids were cast in sterling silver from my original creations. I oxidized them, and the polished the fronts, leaving the back and inside the lines black. They hang on sturdy sterling silver ear wires. Funky and geometric, these will be your favorite new everyday earrings!

name: Cranberry Drusy Ring with Hearts
description: This little biddy features a beautiful purple/raspberry/cranberry colored druzy stones which I set in a sterling silver bezel on a round band. I flanked it with my signature brass hearts, and oxidized the silver to a shiny black finish.

name: Oxidized Sterling Silver Pyramid Pendant
description: Meet my newest design, Pyramid! This particular Pyramid was cast in recycled sterling silver from a design I created myself from scrap sterling silver. I oxidized one side, and polished the other, so you can wear them either way (polished side not shown here). It hangs on a sterling silver cable chain.

name: Brass Star Studs
description: These handsome little studs feature adorable little brass stars, which I soldered sterling silver posts to. With sturdy sterling silver backs.

name: Fish Sticks- Brass Fish Dangles
description: Now you can buy my quirky fish skeletons in brass as earrings! They are hammered and shiny and hang on 14k gold filled ear wires.

name: Fish Sticks- Sterling Silver Fish Earrings
description: Quirky hammered sterling silver fish skeletons hang from sturdy sterling silver ear wires. They each have a slight curve inward. Cast in recycled silver from my original designs. I gave them a shiny polished finish. Lightweight and super great for everyday!

name: Brass Fish Necklace
description: This little guy is full of character. He is cast from my original creation in recycled brass. I gave him a hammered finish and a slight curve, and he hangs on an 18 inch gold plated brass chain.

name: I & Love & You Necklace
description: Who doesn't love this Avett Brother's song? A beautiful necklace to buy yourself or to give to your special someone, I stamped the text on a sterling silver strip and combined it with a beaded heart. The pendant hangs from a lovely 16 inch chain. I gave the heart a frosted finish and the text piece has a highly polished finish with the words oxidized to stand out! This necklace is handmade and each one after will be one of a kind.

name: Sideways Triangle Studs
description: My new favorite studs. The posts are near the top point, so they hang downward. I soldered sterling silver posts to the backs. They have a brushed finish

name: Sterling Silver Nest Ring with Heart
description: This delightfully organic looking ring is handmade by me out of sterling silver. I create the band out of silver wire and solder it to perfection, then oxidize it to a beautiful matte black. I polished the tops of the wires for nice highlights. A perfectly adorable brass heart sits on top of the band for a subtle zap of romance! I make each of these rings custom to order, so no two will be alike.

name: Silver Fishbone Necklace
description: I have finally achieved a perfect fish bone necklace! I formed it out of sterling silver, and had it cast in recycled sterling silver. It has a fabulous hammered shiny finish to it, and has a quirky curve to the site. It hangs on an 18 inch sterling silver chain, which is strung right through the head of the fish, so he (or she) is free to flip back and forth freely.

name: Windmill Dangles
description: These little delights feature blue and white vintage glass windmill cabochons, which I set in sterling silver bezels, and hung on sturdy sterling silver ear wires. They are super lightweight and adorable, too.

name: Single Heart Dangles
description: These delicate delights feature big brass hearts hanging from long curved sterling silver ear wires. Over time the hearts will darken, but to slow the tarnishing process store in a dry place! Perfectly lightweight and great for every day wear.

name: Brass and Sterling Silver Tiny Arrow Studs
description: These darling studs feature teeny tiny brass arrow cut outs. They have sterling silver posts and backs. The arrows have a bright brushed finish, but like any brass, will tarnish over time.

name: Brass Bike Necklace
description: The Famous Le Petit Bike Necklace, previously available only in sterling, now available in bright yellow brass! This beauty of a bike is my own original design, cast in brass. I hammered it to perfection and polished it up bright and shiny! It hangs on a 16 in gold fill chain.

name: Honeycomb Necklace with a Perched Bee - Handmade Necklace
description:
This twist on my classic honeycomb necklace features the gold plated bee charm perched solidly on the honeycomb instead of dangling from! The honeycomb is my original design, cast in recycled sterling silver. It hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver chain, with a total length of about 18 inches. The perfect summertime necklace! 

(The last image show the size of the honeycomb, but with a different bee)

name: Double Triangle Dangles
description: These geometric joys feature to brass triangles hanging from each other on sterling silver jump rings. The ear wires are as long in the back as they are in the front, adding a sleek and stylish touch.

name: Brass Petal Drops
description: These simple but eye catching earrings feature two brass petal shaped pieces, which I gave a light brushed finish. They hang from dainty sterling slier wires that almost mimic the shape of the petal. Super lightweight and swingy, they have wonderful movement.

name: Three Brass Hearts
description: This simple little necklace features three brass hearts, linked together with sterling silver jump rings, on a 16 inch 14k yellow gold-fill chain. Simply irresistible!

name: Mini Honeycomb on 24 inch Brass Chain
description: This spin on my ever popular mini honeycomb features the handmade sterling silver pendant on a long, 24 inch bright yellow brass chain. Looks great over a simple dress or tank top! The honeycomb is cast from recycled sterling silver, and the bee perched on top is gold plated. A beautiful addition to your summer wardrobe.

name: Kinetic Brass Chevron Necklace
description: This geometric dream feature three brass triangles linked together in a scale-like confirmation. It hangs simple on an 18 inch yellow brass chain. Since the triangles hang freely from one another on sterling silver jump rings, they have a great movement and jingle! Handmade by me in my studio.

name: Tiny Triangle Necklace in Brass
description: This perfect little necklace features a small brass triangle on a 16 inch yellow 14k gold-fill chain. Goes great with any outfit! Handmade by me in my studio.

name: Black Square Ring
description: You will never want to take this ring off once you put it on! It was cast in recycled sterling silver from the original model that I made from scratch. I gave it an oxidized shiny black finish. It is hammered to perfection. Currently about a size 6.5, but can be made in any size.

name: Sterling Silver Square Ring
description: This darling ring is an original Rachel Pfeffer design. It is cast from my own creation, and features an organic hammered square. Perfectly adorable and great for every day wear! Solid sterling silver with a highly polished finish.

name: Blue Drusy Heart Ring
description: This lovely ring features my solid sterling silver heart ring, accented with a sparkling blue drusy stone bezel set on top! The heart curves slightly over the finger, and is ultra comfortable to be wear! Completely handmade by me.

name: Brass Drop Dangles
description: These eye catching earrings feature large brass drop shapes that I gave a shiny, slightly textured finish! They hang from each other on sterling silver jump rings, and have sterling silver posts on the top ones. So light weight you will forget you are wearing them, until a stranger compliments you on them. They hang about 3.25 inches long.

name: Bow and Arrow Necklace
description: Cute. Sterling Silver. Tiny. Handmade. 16 inch cable chain. Katniss. Artemis. Hunger Games. Hunting.

name: Brass Anchor Necklace
description: This lovely little gold colored necklace features an anchor that I originally created out of metal and then had cast in brass. It hangs on an 18 inch brass cable chain, with a 14k gold filled jump ring.

name: Black Anchor Necklace
description: This wonderfully quirky anchor is cast in recycled sterling silver from an original design I created from scratch. I oxidized the anchor to a shiny black finish, and it hangs on an oxidized 16 inch sterling silver cable chain.

name: Sterling Silver Anchor Necklace
description: This lovely hammered sterling silver pendant was cast out of recycled silver from an anchor I made from scratch. It hangs on a 20 inch sterling silver cable chain, but can be put on a shorter one upon request.

name: Anchor Dangles
description: These shiny hammered anchors are cast out of recycled sterling silver from an original anchor that I created out of sterling silver. They dangle on sturdy sterling silver ear wires. The perfect size and shape for any anchor lover!

name: Anchor Studs
description: These glorious anchor studs feature my own origin design that I hand forged and then had cast using the lost wax method. I gave the anchors a shiny and hammered finish. They have sterling silver posts. Very unique and eye catching, the perfect nautical accent for any outfit!

name: Bow and Arrow Studs
description: These little beauties are cast from originals that I hand forged from scratch. They have a wonderful, quirky quality that gives them tons of character. The silver has a super shiny highly polished finish, and they have sterling silver posts. Completely adorable, and I'm sure both Katniss and Artemis would approve.

name: Black Oval Drusy with Hearts
description: This little beauty of a ring is completely fabricated by me from scratch! I created a sterling silver bezel setting with a slightly roughed up, hammered finish. It is set on a round sterling silver band with two brass hearts flanking the stone. I set the stone in the setting and brush finished the very top lip, giving it a highlighted border. This ring is currently about a 6, 6.5 but I can make another in a different size for you!

name: Tiny Bike Necklace with Silver Hearts
description: This darling necklace features my signature Le Very Petit Bike necklace, but this time with small, subtle silver hearts on the spokes. The necklace comes on an adorable little valentine's day card- killing two birds with one stone! It hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver chain.

name: Brass Heart Dangles
description: These are quite possible my new favorite go to earrings! I links four brass hearts together into a chain and hung them from a sterling silver ear wire. They are held together with sterling silver jump ring. They make a great jangle sound, and are the perfect size to be attention grabbing without going over the top! And they are so light weight you won't even realize you are wearing earrings!! I make each pair myself!

name: 14k Gold Open Heart Ring
description: This elegant and fancy ring is my signature heart design made out of solid 14k gold. It is super comfortable and the perfect ring for every day wear. I hammered and gave it a super shiny finish. Perfectly delightful.

name: Your Beard is Good- Recycled Key Chain
description:
Whether you've seen the Flight of the Concords episode or not, this key chain is an essential gift for any guy you like with a beard.

This ever so popular key chain is cast from an original design that I stamped and hammered into an old silver quarter that I rolled flat, so the edges stil have a faint ridged texture. I cast them in recycled yellow brass, which I gave a bright brushed finish.

name: Mini Honeycomb Necklace
description: A petite version of the ever popular honeycomb necklace! This three-celled pendant is handmade from sterling silver wire with a delightful gold plated brass bee perched lovingly on the comb. It hangs on an 18 inch sterling silver chain. Perfect for any bee or honey lover! I make each one by hand so yours will be made just for you.

name: Honeycomb Necklace on Sterling Chain
description:
To quote a happy customer:
"so so so beautiful!!! i got it for a friend and she cried when i gave it to her she loved it so much :) thank you!!!"

I handmade this original honeycomb design and then cast it and hammered each one to perfection. A gold plated brass bee charm hangs cheerfully from the bottom of the honeycomb. It comes on a sparkly 16 inch sterling silver cable chain.

A signature Rachel Pfeffer design, it's the perfect everyday necklace!

name: Sterling Silver Handmade Bow Studs
description:
Wee little Sterling Silver bows, ready to be given as a gift to your sweetie or yourself!

These little bows are hand formed by me, with melted and rounded hammered ends. They have sterling silver post backs, and since each pair is handmade and one of a kind, they will vary ever so slightly from each other. No two pairs are alike because I make the bows by hand individually!

name: Lurve Loaf  Luff Keychain
description: This wonderful key chain is cast in yellow brass from my original creation, featuring the Annie Hall classic words Lurve, Loaf, Luff. The key ring is strong metal, as is the jump ring connecting them! The piece has a bright brushed finish, with darkened letters.

name: Flat Silver Heart Ring
description: This fabulous Rachel Pfeffer original ring will be your new favorite every day ring! A perfect curved heart is set on a heavy hammered round band- the heart sits flatly on your finger for extra comfort. The heart has a shiny, slightly brushed, super bright finish. Looks amazing with 2 or 3, each on a different finger!

name: Gold Fill Bow Necklace
description: This darling handmade bow is made out of shiny 14k gold filled wire. I hammered and polished it to perfection. It hangs on a yellow 14k gold filled 16 inch cable chain, and is perfectly dainty and quirky and cute. Since I handmade each one, no two are identical

name: Open Heart Ring- Sterling Silver
description: This is just the best everyday ring, I do believe. It's made by me out of sterling silver and has a hammered, shiny finish. Please indicate size when ordering in a message!

name: Oxidized Heart Ring
description: This super comfy and edgy ring features a big flat sterling silver heart on a heavy round band. I oxidized the silver to a dark shiny finish. The heart is slightly textured, and acts like finger armor. Looks great when worn in multiples!

name: Black and White Heart Band
description: This beautiful ring features a three-segmented solid sterling silver band with a petit silver heart on top. I oxidized the band and polished the heart so that it really pops off the band. Beautiful and simple, perfect for an every day band! (or even a wedding band!) Please specify your size when ordering!

name: Heart Bib Necklace
description: This lovely new design of mine features perfect brass hearts linked together with sterling silver jump rings. The piece hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver cable chain, that can be worn shorter by closing the clasp on any link! I handmade each of these necklaces myself.

name: Brass Triangle Studs
description: These little studs have .5 inch brass triangles with a brushed finish. They have sterling silver posts. Handmade and adorable!

name: Large Brass Heart Studs
description: These simple darlings are the larger version of the tiny brass heart studs! I soldered sturdy sterling silver post backs to the back near the top- they are perfect for every day wear, and are coated in a clear...coating...to prevent tarnishing. Each pair os handmade by me!

name: Missing Pie Piece with Black Onyx Rings
description:
Some of you may recognize this ring set. 

Let me be clear:

The big ring is a pie missing a piece. The first main ring features a sterling silver missing pie piece pie. The following three rings are sterling silver as well with black onyx cabs on top. 

When you order, please be sure to email me your four ring sizes, as it's impossible to make all those options available below!

name: Double Sided Circle earrings
description:
Two earrings in one! These Rachel Pfeffer originals feature a dainty hammered sterling silver circle with a sturdy silver post, and a larger circle that has a hole drilled in the top, which you slide onto the post behind your ear, and then place the rubber stopper behind it to keep it in place!! 

You can wear the small drops alone, or jazz it up with a subtle optical illusion accent! They have a bright frosted finish and are handmade by me. Each pair is handmade to order!

name: Honey Knuckles
description:
Meet Honey Knuckles II !!! This beautiful humdinger of a knuckle ring features the signature sterling silver Rachel Pfeffer designed honeycomb on a comfortable double band, with a wee gold plated bee perched gleefully on the comb somewhere!! It's super comfortable and I think looks best when worn on the middle finger!! Please specify ring size when you order. It's all sterling silver and all handmade! 

******************************************************
IMPORTANT SHIPPING INFORMATION: Everything shipped in the US is sent USPS Priority, which takes about 2-3 days, with delivery confirmation. 

For International Customers: I automatically ship everything USPS First Class, which can take anywhere from a few days to several weeks. I have never had anything not land at it's destination, but I cannot take responsibility for anything once it is shipped, and am not responsible for any packages that get damaged or lost. 

If you would like to pay an extra $8, I would happily ship your item Priority, which is supposed to take 7-10 days, but occasionally takes longer. Again, there is no guarantee or tracking number.

If you'd like your item Express Mailed, please contact me for prices.

name: Tiny Sterling Silver Bike Ring
description:
Did you always want one of my bike rings but thought they were too big? Well then, hold onto your hats! There's a new ring in town! This little biddy is made out of sterling silver with a unique twisted band. It is super comfortable and light weight and utterly delightful.

The bike is a cast version of an original that I made out of silver by hand. It is solid sterling silver and full of character.

name: Le Petit Bike Necklace
description:
This ever popular necklace is made from a fun loving bike that I handmade and then cast out of sterling silver. I hammer each one and then polish them to a super shiny finish. This particular listing is for the bike on an 16 inch long sterling silver cable chain. A true Rachel Pfeffer Original!

Bikes with hearts available in the shop too!

name: Two Hearts on a Finger
description: This dainty ring sure does pack an edgy punch! A heavy round sterling silver band has been oxidized to a beautiful black, which lets the two brass hearts shine even more! They have a frosted finish which really makes them pop. The ring is open on top, so it is somewhat adjustable.

name: Large Sterling Silver Bike Studs
description: Every time I wear my pair of Le Petit Bike Earrings, more than one stranger approaches me and said how amazing they were! They are far more comfortable than they look- a sturdy sterling silver post makes the bike look like it's merely floating on your ear lobe! They are solid sterling silver, cast from my original Rachel Pfeffer bike design, and are just big enough to really make a statement!

name: Tiny Sterling Silver Bow Necklace
description: A perfect necklace for the perfect girl! This little cutie has a hand knotted sterling silver bow (made by me!) on a delicate 16 inch sterling silver chain. Dainty and adorable, this necklace will make any outfit outstanding! No two are identical because I make each bow individually.

name: Tiny Sterling Silver Bike Necklace
description:
This little darling features a tiny hammered solid sterling silver bike that I handmade and then had cast. No two bikes are alike because I hammer and alter each one to give them their own personality. This little guy hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver cable chain. It is comfortable to wear and lightweight and you will never want to take it off! (I sleep in mine). 

They have a shiny polished finish and are just the right size for someone looking for a slightly subtle, but perfectly quirky necklace to add to their collection.

name: Tiny Sterling Bike Necklace with Hearts
description: Yet another variation on the newly debuted Wee Bike necklace! This time, the sterling silver bike is adorned with two teeny brass hearts. I created the original bike and then had it cast, but each one is finished differently so no two are identical! It is solid sterling silver and hangs on a 16 inch sterling silver chain. I then solder on the little hearts and hammered everything to perfection. The bike is super shiny, and the hearts have a frosted finish to make them really pop!

name: Handmade Honeycomb Dangles
description: These earrings are the most popular of the honeycomb earring series. A handmade sterling silver honeycomb hangs from a sterling silver ear wire, with a little gold colored bee hanging from the middle on two gold filled rings. They swing just the right amount, and are the epitome of honeybee goodness. I make each earring individually, just for you!

name: Le Petit Bike Ring
description:
Love the big bold two finger bike knuckle ring but wish it was smaller?

You're in luck! I make each bike ring individually, so the ring is made especially for you! I made the original bike, made a mold, and had it cast It is a Rachel Pfeffer original design and each ring is one of a kind.

name: Tiny Sterling Silver Bike Studs
description: A smaller version of my signature Petite Bikes, these little earrings (or not so little, depending on what you wear) are cast from original bikes that I formed out of silver. These are also sterling silver and hammered, with a highly polished finish. They have silver posts, and are so light weight you will forget you are wearing them, until a stranger approaches you and compliments them. Beautifully unique and handmade by me!

name: Black and Gold- Oxidized Sterling Silver Bike Pendant with Brass Hearts
description:
An edgier take on the classic Petite Bike Necklace, this handmade sterling silver bike has been oxidized to a nice gun-metal black finish, and the hand-pierced little brass hearts on the spokes were given a brushed finish to really pop off of the bike! The pendant hangs on a 16 inch 14k gold-fill chain that matches the hearts. The whole necklace has wonderful contrasting colors and is sure to brighten your day! 

It was handmade by me in my studio and is one of a kind, since no two are alike.

name: Sterling Silver Bike Tie Tack/Lapel Pin
description:
WHAT: Tie Tack/Lapel Pin
WHO: Any stylin' guy who wears ties and rides bikes!
WHAT AGAIN: The bike is solid sterling silver with a brushed finish, and the pin and clutch on the back is silver colored nickel plated brass.
WHY: Because you're a cool cat/your boyfriend/brother/dad/husband/any tie wearer is a cool cat and needs a tie tack to match!

Any questions?

"Me, Me! Did you make the bike yourself?"

Answer: I designed and created the original bike out of sterling silver wire, and this is a cast version of the original bike! I turn each one into a tie tack and finish it myself.

name: Sterling Silver Bike Cuff Links
description:
These cufflinks are perfect for that dapper biker! They are little solid sterling silver bikes that I made originally and then cast. I soldered them sturdily to sterling silver cuff link backs. They are substantial and each pair is unique! The bikes are highly polished and have a unique hammered finish. They are available with a matte finish as well. 

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your cuff links to be made and shipped!

name: 14 Gold Nest Ring with Turquoise
description: As I've said before, I love turquoise and gold! This beautiful ring was cast in solid recycled 14k gold from a nest made I made originally out of sterling silver wire. I set a bright green/blue turquoise cabochon in a sterling silver bezel. The ring is currently about a 5.5, but can be sized. Please specify your size when you order. It is one of a kind and handmade by me!

name: Sterling Silver Bow Ring Promise Ring Knot Ring
description: This comfortable and sturdy bow ring is made out of heavy (but not too heavy) sterling silver round wire. The bow is hand knotted by yours truly, and attached to a comfortable round band. This ring is made to order, so no two are identical, but will be very similar to this one! Please message me your size when ordering!

name: 14K Gold fill Heart Ring by Rachel Pfeffer
description: This dainty and delightfully darling ring featured a hammered, handformed heart made out of 14k gold-filled wire, which means it won't fade or chip away. The heart seamlessly melts in the comfortably and light round band, made of the same material. The joints are soldered using 10k gold solder. It's so comfortable and beautiful you will never want to take it!
